description:
Limit / Restrict the characters for an Input. E.g. disable: "spaces", "capital letters" or "caseless characters" etc.

You can also add custom characters to allow / disallow!

name: Limit / Restrict Input Characters
plugin_instructions:
If you need an example, take a look at the demo page!

1 - Place the 'Limit/Restrict Input Characters' element on the page.

2 - Give your Bubble input element an ID attribute.

If you don't see this the ID attribute option at the bottom of your input element properties, make sure you've enabled the HTML ID setting. You can do this under:

a. Settings
b. General
c. Scroll all the way down to 'Advanced Options'
d. Check the box for â†’ 'Expose the option to add an ID attribute to HTML elements'

3 - Use the ID attribute inside the plugin ID list.
